package.name: GoneDark
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
A nice theme with lots of variants. «Glossy, simple, dark... and light», as is stated on theme's page.

This theme supports grouping consecutive messages, has different color variants and has with both dark and light styling.

This theme is included in standard LeechCraft distribution, but may be missing in some distros due to unclear licensing status of this theme.
